Plot: Ruthless executive Christine brings on Isabelle as her assistant, and she takes delight in toying with the young woman's innocence. But when the protégé's ideas become tempting enough for ...
Title: Love Crime
Writer: Alain Corneau (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Natalie Carter (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue)
Actors: Ludivine Sagnier, Kristin Scott Thomas, Patrick Mille, Guillaume Marquet
tomatoConsensus: Director Corneau's swan song, Love Crime is smart and typically well-directed, but too thin and formulaic to overcome its melodramatic trappings.
